full_product_name.product_name: webkit2gtk3-0:2.30.4-3.el8_4 as a component of Red Hat Enterprise Linux AppStream (v. 8)

notes.note: webkitgtk: Use-after-free leading to arbitrary code execution

reference.description: bz#2006099: CVE-2021-30858 webkitgtk: Use-after-free leading to arbitrary code execution

remediation.description:
For details on how to apply this update, which includes the changes described in this advisory, refer to:
https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258

note:
An update for webkit2gtk3 is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.
Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Moderate. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.

WebKitGTK is the port of the portable web rendering engine WebKit to the GTK platform.
Security Fix(es):
* webkitgtk: Use-after-free leading to arbitrary code execution (CVE-2021-30858)
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
Bug Fix(es):
* WebProcess::initializeWebProcess crashing on aarch64 (BZ#2010825)
